description:
A 6 pack of some of the lightest full-size carabiners on the market, the Photons adds confidence to your rack without adding weight. The larger size is easier to operate while wearing gloves or for trad and alpine climbers with larger hands.

  • I-beam construction has great strength-to-weight ratio
  • Stronger and more rigid that the previous model
  • Colours match most cams to ID when racking
  • Includes 6 carabiners
name: Camp Photon Wire Rack Carabiner (6 Pack)
